# pytorch_examples
Pytorch codes for simple networks are presented.  
It is made to be modular stones for other jobs.

## Classes

### Data handler

### Networks
* Embedding
* MLP
* RNN
* CNN
* Transformer part

### Models
* AE
* Classifier (including Regressor)
* Transformer

### utils
* Accuracy
* Early stop
* logger
* configure

### text processing
1. tokenize
    * spacy
    * morphem analyzer
2. vectorize
    * spacy vectors
    * glove
    * BERT
